title: Aquarius and Pisces Compatibility: Love, Sex, and More

steps.title: Yes, this duo will have a very creative and fulfilling relationship.
steps.content: Yes, this duo will have a very creative and fulfilling relationship. Both signs are empathetic and justice-oriented, always striving to make the world a better place. Aquarius is an air sign that's passionate about new ideas and humanitarian causes. They'll be drawn to Pisces' compassionate nature. A water sign, Pisces is sensitive and caring. [1] X Research source They'll admire their Aquarius partner's passion for social justice and will help them get in touch with their emotions. Aquarius is ruled by the 11th House of Friendships, so they want their partner to be like a best friend. This makes the sweet and tender Pisces a perfect match. Pisces is ruled by the 12th House of the Unconscious . This makes Pisces very in tune with their partner's emotions (even the hidden ones). They'll encourage a guarded Aquarius to show their true selves.

steps.title: Both open-minded, this pair will love trying new things in the bedroom.
steps.content: Both open-minded, this pair will love trying new things in the bedroom. A very giving sign, Pisces wants to please their Aquarius partner and make their fantasies a reality. Aquarius appreciates Pisces' imagination in bed, and they're always happy to try anything experimental or out of the ordinary. The two will enjoy exploring each other's wildest desires, and they'll have a very fulfilling sex life. As a water sign, Pisces is more in touch with their feelings than Aquarius (a slightly aloof air sign). To establish a deeper connection in the bedroom, Pisces will need to give Aquarius time to get comfortable showing their emotions.

steps.title: Aquarius and Pisces will be a great fit if they balance their logical and emotional natures.
steps.content: Aquarius and Pisces will be a great fit if they balance their logical and emotional natures. Aquarius can talk all day about social issues, but they may shy away from opening up about their feelings. A Pisces, on the other hand, needs to talk about their feelings out loud and craves reassurance from their partner. If these two find a compromise and avoid taking each other's differences personally, they'll make an incredible match. [2] X Research source Aquarius can push themselves to embrace their deeper feelings and voice how much they care about their partner. It may not come naturally to them at first, but it will mean the world to a Pisces. Pisces can try to see Aquarius's logical view of their emotions as part of their nature. An Aquarius may struggle to open up, but that doesn't mean they're any less devoted to their partner.

steps.title: Both dreamers with big ideas, this pair shares a strong intellectual connection.
steps.content: Both dreamers with big ideas, this pair shares a strong intellectual connection. Aquarius is the humanitarian of the zodiac, so they'll be drawn to Pisces's spiritual and caring soul. The two will love talking about their plans to make the world a better place, and they'll enjoy brainstorming new ways they can help their community. Both one-of-a-kind individuals, they'll be happy to have finally found someone who understands them. Though these two can talk for hours about their dreams for a better world, they'll be most fulfilled if they set their plans in motion. They can help each other do just that by being encouraging and supportive.

steps.title: Aquarius and Pisces will help each other process their emotions in a healthy way.
steps.content: Aquarius and Pisces will help each other process their emotions in a healthy way. Pisces' intuitive nature as a water sign will help an Aquarius come out of their shell and let their guard down. Aquarius (a logical air sign) will encourage Pisces to approach their feelings a little more rationally. Together, they're just what the other needs to establish a healthy emotional connection. [3] X Research source A Pisces sometimes gets overwhelmed by their deep emotions, which may be hard for an Aquarius to understand. Even if they don't quite get it, an Aquarius can support their partner by listening to them and providing encouragement. Reader Poll: We asked 819 wikiHow readers who are Pisces, and 53% of them said that the compliment they’d most like to receive would be something sweet about their personality, like: “You have a great heart.” [Take Poll] So Aquarius, to build your connection with Pisces, make sure to offer sweet compliments like this!

steps.title: The couple will establish trust by giving each other plenty of freedom.
steps.content: The couple will establish trust by giving each other plenty of freedom. Aquarius is very independent and needs a lot of space. [4] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Unlike their partner, Pisces sometimes struggles with being a little too dependent in their relationships. These two can absolutely make things work if they understand each other's different needs. If Pisces allows Aquarius the freedom and alone time they need, Aquarius will be more than happy to commit.

steps.title: Aquarius and Pisces will love artistic and creative dates.
steps.content: Aquarius and Pisces will love artistic and creative dates. Both signs possess a unique and imaginative view of the world, and they'll love spending time with someone that understands them. They'll be happiest if they join forces in their creative and humanitarian pursuits. [5] X Research source This couple will enjoy fun and illuminating activities like: Volunteering together to help their community Collaborating on a short film Attending a poetry reading Checking out a local band (or starting a band themselves)
